page.title: 02LOWER MOUNT FARM, COOKHAM.
page.content: Lower Mount Farm covers a total of 300 acres. It is owned by Tom and Geoffery Copas, and is the head- quarters of Copas Bros. Farming Operation. Their other farms cover land from Heathrow in the east, to Henley in the west. At Lower Mount farm all of the machinery for the other farms is housed, and looked after. They also have a corn drying plant, and potato sorting equipment. The farm produces a variety of crops including wheat, potatoes, peas, field beans, soft fruits, apples and plums. They are growing three types of wheat to experiment to see which grows the best. Most of the crops, apart from the fruits, are grown on a six year rotation, to make best possible use of the land. The soft fruits are grown on a "Pick your own" basis.
